name: The Marvelous Adventures of Dart
description:
Tame the tropical rainforest’s wildest wilds and escape with some loot to
boot as the titular treasure hunter, Dart the frog. Explore the crash-bandicoot inspired levels filled with harsh wildlife, traps, and other natural dangers. 

The game is centered around Dart the treasure hunting Frog’s search for
treasure in the amazon rainforest. It is a very simple story with a few environmental
details to tie everything together in the form of the Aztec ruins at the end of each level, which comes together in level 3, where the player fights an Aztec Statue. Dart gets to each location by hopping out of his tree and embarking toward the adventure

*Use your spit and spin moves to take out a wide variety of enemies!

*Collect as much treasure as you can in a 3D platformer rainforest!

*Experience a variety of lush and colorful levels!

Download and experience The Marvelous Adventures of Dart today!
